millomod.title: The Millo Modeth
millo.feature.auto_command.desc: Automatically doth insert an @ in front of thy messages
millo.feature.lagslayer.desc: The visage of the lord Lagslayer, demolisher of perpetrating loiters
millo.feature.menu_search.desc: Displayeth a crows nest in menus to uncover named artifacts
millo.feature.notification_tray.desc: Displayeth a tray of information related to this mod
millo.feature.preview_skin.desc: Peereth upon a player's skin when hovering o'er player heads
millo.feature.search.desc: Embarketh upon an arcane quest through code realm for specific actions
millo.feature.tracker.desc: Hath an eye upon the server's domain, as if by clandestine espionage
millo.feature.plot_caching.desc: Behold the dode of domains to be rested within the tombs, to be beheld by thine
millo.feature.show_tags.desc: Obtain knowledge of an artifact's hidden value
millo.feature.auto_chat_local.desc: Be put in fullest of isolation automaticallyy
millo.feature.fs_toggle.desc: Tune aerial advancement maneuverability betwixt two expenses
millo.feature.mode_switcher.desc: An expeditious prominence alternator to forego the need to open dialogue
millo.command.settings.desc: Openth the Millo Modeth settings menu
millo.command.save.desc: Preserveth the current dev state (inventory + position) as if by a magic spell
millo.command.colors.desc: [/col] Unleasheth a custom color wheel for creating hues of a magical nature
millo.command.millo.desc: Showeth a list of all features
millo.command.cache.desc: Unveileth the cache menu, with an optional <plot> argument which doth scour the entire plot. Useth with utmost caution.
millo.command.dfgive.desc: Bestoweth an artifact akin to default /give, with the option to bestow from the clipboard if the artifact be too grand.
config.millo.title: The Millo Modeth Settings
